item.title: Hosting Docker in Cloud (Azure)
item.description: Azure part of story First create one Azure account, I am using a student account Create a basic instance (Ubuntu image works for most cases) with 1 vCPU and 1 GiB RAM, or according to your needs Download the private key and SSH into the instance Update the packages Install docker (following this guide) Let’s move on to the local machine setup Â Local machine setup SSH Keys Setup We need to install docker here as well Add ssh key (downloaded from Azure portal) to OpenSSH Auth agent eval 'ssh-agent' ssh-add <path-to-pem-file>/<file-name>.
